ticket.title: Trusted workflow context and preflight authorization gate for FAC projection

tickets.reason: Workflow entrypoint must target stable FAC CLI command contracts.

in_scope: Unify projection orchestration under a trusted workflow path with explicit barrier/kickoff stages.
Add GitHub-hosted preflight authorization checks before any self-hosted FAC dispatch.
Fail closed for untrusted actor associations and ambiguous base-ref trust conditions.
Emit explicit authorization and trust decision lines in workflow logs.
out_of_scope: Reviewer liveness and restart policy implementation.

steps: Define preflight policy predicates and failure reasons.
Wire hosted preflight job and conditional self-hosted dispatch stage.
Bind trusted workflow execution semantics for authoritative projection path.
Add CI-level regression checks for unauthorized and ambiguous contexts.

criteria: Self-hosted review dispatch never runs without successful preflight authorization.
Unauthorized or ambiguous trust context terminates projection path with explicit failure.
Workflow logs expose decision evidence for preflight trust checks.

notes.security: This ticket enforces deny-by-default identity and trust semantics for projection entry.
notes.verification: Include workflow tests/fixtures for OWNER/MEMBER/COLLABORATOR and explicit deny classes.
notes.general: This ticket is the workflow trust boundary companion to the FAC CLI runtime work.
